pr_title: XRDDEV-1178: Add sorting for services and service clients views

timeline.message: XRDDEV-1178: Add sorting for services and service clients views

timeline.bodyText:
Could this be simplified to:
...
this.serviceCandidates = serviceDescriptions.flatMap(serviceDescription => serviceDescription.services)
...
timeline.author: carohauta
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -92,13 +93,13 @@ export default Vue.extend({
 
           // Parse all services for the current client and map them to ServiceCandidates (manually added type for
           // objects that are used to add and list services that can be granted access rights to).
-          this.serviceCandidates = serviceDescriptions
-            .reduce(
-              (curr: Service[], next: ServiceDescription) =>
-                curr.concat(...next.services),
-              [],
-            )
-            .map((service: Service) => ({
+          this.serviceCandidates = serviceDescriptions.reduce(
+            (curr: Service[], next: ServiceDescription) =>
+              curr.concat(...next.services),
+            [],
+          )
